mil3.4.7:1.3: ‘ayam maha pathavi udake patitthita, udakam vate patitthitam, vato akase patitthito’ti, etampi vacanam na saddahami”ti.
mil3.4.7:1.4: Thero dhammakarakena udakam gahetva rajanam milindam sannapesi—
mil3.4.7:1.5: “yatha, maharaja, imam udakam vatena adharitam, evam tampi udakam vatena adharitan”ti.
